wikipedia_page.main: Kleon Penn (born September 1, 1986) is a British Virgin Islander-Puerto Rican professional basketball player for the Brujos de Guayama of the Baloncesto Superior Nacional (BSN). He is currently the league’s all-time leader in blocks. He played college basketball for H. Lavity Stoutt Community College and McNeese State.
